font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】adj. 过时的：having passed its time of use or usefulness
【例】dressed in a moth-eaten style 过时的衣着
【近】 antiquated, archaic, dated, fossilized, moribund, outdated, outworn, rusty
【反】fresh, new 崭新的；promising 充满希望的
